meta.note: Scripts are best-effort: they just send lines with small delays.

uboot_backup_min: echo TIP: Use ums 0 mmc 0 if USB-OTG works (preferred full backup).
uboot_ums_start: echo [K2] Starting UMS (USB Mass Storage) on mmc0
uboot_ums_stop_hint: echo [K2] To stop UMS: reset board or unplug USB, then reboot.
uboot_check_fw_file: echo [K2] Looking for /firmware.bin on SD/USB (if present)
echo NOTE: this script does not load files itself; it just reminds you.
echo Use: fatls mmc 1:1 or ext4ls mmc 1:1 depending on media/partition.
uboot_flash_warn: echo If this board has write-size limitations, DO NOT do huge single writes.
echo Prefer chunked writes + verify after each stage.
echo Recommended: write smaller blocks and verify.
